name: Nealite
tagline: The Experience Center of PwC France
description:
Nealite (PwC France) is a consulting agency specialized in user experience design, as well as web and mobile usability.
With over 30 experts in our multidisciplinary team - usability experts, information architects, artistic directors - and innovative methodologies founded upon design thinking, they help companies develop client loyalty by adapting their image and service to user expectations.
